body.p:
Covington July 4/61
Jos W Tate Esqr
Dear Sir

Before this reaches you a petition from Nortin Hoover to th govenor will have been received by him. The facts are contained in the petition & th letters in regard to Hoovers case. Will you please direct th attention of the govenor to the matter & particularly to the statement of Mr Arthur Commonwealths Atto on the margin of the petition The case of Hoover is a meritorious one I have no doubt -- if th govenor remits th punishment please send th remission to me
